item.title: 美国货币市场资产升至四周来最高水平
item.description: 货币市场基金资产连续第三周上涨，原因是在美联储决策者发出不急于放松货币政策的信号后，市场预期短期利率将继续走高。【原文：Money-market fund assets rose for the third straight week on expectations short-term rates will remain elevated after Federal Reserve policymakers signaled they are in no rush to ease monetary policy.】

item.title: 数据中心所有者 Equinix 自 2008 年以来的最大涨幅颠覆了空头押注
item.description: Equinix Inc. 15 年来的最大涨幅正在挤压押注该股的做空者。【原文：Equinix Inc.’s biggest rally in 15-years is squeezing short-sellers who piled into bets against the stock.】

item.title: 美联储戴利称限制性利率发挥作用需要 "更多时间
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，利率目前正在抑制经济，但要使通胀率回归目标可能还需要 "更多时间"。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said interest rates are currently restraining the economy, but it may take “more time” to return inflation to their goal.】

item.title: 路透社称电力巨头 Calpine 的所有者正在探索出售事宜
item.description: 据路透社援引知情人士的话报道，发电厂巨头 Calpine 公司的所有者正在考虑各种方案，其中包括出售或首次公开募股。【原文：The owners of power-plant giant Calpine Corp. are considering options that include a sale or an initial public offering, Reuters reports, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 做空者指控欺诈后 Arbor Realty 股价下跌
item.description: 在 Viceroy Research 在其最新报告中指责公寓楼贷款公司 Arbor Realty Trust Inc.【原文：Shares of Arbor Realty Trust Inc., a lender to apartment buildings, dropped as much as 6% after Viceroy Research accused the firm of fraud in its latest report.】

item.title: 德意志银行称近 300 次外汇挂钩失败是稳定币风险
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank Research）的分析师在研究了自 1800 年以来的 334 种货币挂钩后发现，只有 14% 的挂钩货币存活了下来。将他们的研究成果应用到稳定币世界中，他们认为这些挂钩数字货币中的大多数注定会变得不稳定。【原文：After studying 334 currency pegs since the year 1800, Deutsche Bank Research analysts found that only 14% have survived. Applying what they learned to the world of stablecoins, they say most of these pegged digital currencies are doomed to become unmoored.】

item.title: 高盛认为特朗普与拜登大选呼声延迟是一种交易风险
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc：大选之夜没有决定。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. says traders trying to game out the upcoming presidential campaign are missing one big risk: No decision on election night.】

item.title: 英国央行和市场一致看好 6 月降息前景
item.description: 几个月来，英国央行和市场一直在利率走向问题上针锋相对，美国联邦储备委员会在影响市场预期方面比英国央行的言论更为有力。【原文：After months in which the Bank of England and markets have been at loggerheads over the direction of interest rates — with the US Federal Reserve more powerful in shaping expectations than words from the UK central bank — they have now fallen roughly into line.】

item.title: 巴里-斯特恩利希特称迈阿密受制于 "不可能 "的入学机会
item.description: 亿万富翁巴里-斯特恩利希特（Barry Sternlicht）表示，迈阿密的增长故事还远未结束，即使该地区学校短缺这一近期繁荣的主要外溢效应正在阻碍其吸引更多居民的能力。【原文：Billionaire Barry Sternlicht said Miami’s growth story is far from over even as a shortage of schools in the area, a key spillover effect from its recent boom, is hindering its ability to lure more residents.】

item.title: 延迟交付食糖引发有关交易所规则的争论
item.description: 通过纽约一家主要商品交易所出售的食糖延迟交货，引发了交易商关于现行交易规则是否足以保护买方的争论。【原文：Delays to deliveries of sugar sold through a major commodity exchange in New York have sparked a debate among traders about whether the current rules on transactions are sufficient to protect buyers.】

item.title: 利率降低，成本增加，大型市政债券交易将刷新纪录
item.description: 在美联储首次通过连续 11 次加息抑制债券销售两年后，各州和各市对债务的需求呈现爆炸性增长。【原文：States and municipalities are demonstrating an explosive demand for debt two years after the Fed first suppressed bond sales with a series of 11 interest rate increases.】

item.title: 芯片软件公司 Silvaco 首次公开募股后股价最高上涨 14
item.description: Silvaco 集团公司首次公开发行股票，募集资金 1.14 亿美元，定价在市场范围的最高点，公司股价在首次公开发行后上涨了 14%。【原文：Silvaco Group Inc. shares rose as much as 14% in the company’s debut after an initial public offering that raised $114 million, pricing at the top of a marketed range.】

item.title: 比特币 ETF 资金外流，灰度公司季度收入持平
item.description: 灰度投资公司（Grayscale Investments）第一季度收入持平，因为这家全球最大的加密货币投资工具发行商决定维持其旗舰产品比特币交易所交易基金的收费标准。【原文：Grayscale Investments’s first-quarter revenue was flat after the issuer of the world’s largest cryptocurrency investment vehicle decided to hold the line on fees for its flagship Bitcoin exchange-traded fund.】

item.title: 2.15 亿美元首次公开募股后，精通汽车股价一路走低
item.description: Proficient Auto Logistics Inc. 在首次公开募股中募集到 2.15 亿美元后，开盘基本持平，交易定价为市场区间的中点。【原文：Proficient Auto Logistics Inc. opened roughly flat after raising $215 million in an initial public offering, after pricing the deal at the midpoint of a marketed range.】

item.title: 约翰-列侬音乐经销商获得 5 亿美元扩张资金
item.description: 帮助词曲作者和其他版权持有者管理其目录的 Downtown Music Holdings 公司扩大了与美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：Downtown Music Holdings, which helps songwriters and other rights holders manage their catalogs, expanded its credit facility with Bank of America Corp., securing an additional $500 million for lending to musicians.】

item.title: 油砂产量预计将因价格强劲而出现超预期增长
item.description: 根据 S&P Global Commodity Insights 的预测，到 2030 年，加拿大的油砂日产量将增加约 50 万桶，超过此前的预测，因为更强劲的价格鼓励企业扩大现有项目。【原文：Canadian oil-sands output will increase by about half a million barrels a day by 2030, more than previously forecast, as stronger prices encourage companies to expand existing projects, according to S&P Global Commodity Insights.】

item.title: 私人信贷压力给米尔肯带来焦虑和机遇
item.description: 私人信贷经理们正在为美国企业压力的上升做好准备，因为利率长期走高意味着一些公司将在债务负担上陷入困境。【原文：Private credit managers are bracing for an uptick in stress across corporate America as higher interest rates for longer mean some companies will struggle with their debt loads.】

item.title: 津巴布韦将对未使用 ZiG 官方汇率的公司处以罚款
item.description: 津巴布韦将对不使用新 ZiG 货币现行官方外汇汇率进行交易的个人和公司进行处罚。【原文：Zimbabwe will penalize individuals and companies which don’t use the prevailing official foreign-exchange rate of its new ZiG currency for transactions.】

item.title: 巴拿马穆利诺表示，任何矿业谈判都将使用新机制
item.description: 巴拿马当选总统表示，他没有关于在这个中美洲国家重开一个巨型铜矿的建议，只是说未来的任何运营模式都不会使用之前签署的那种 "充满违宪问题 "的合同。【原文：Panama’s president-elect said he has no proposal for reopening a giant copper mine in the Central American country, saying only that any future operating model wouldn’t use the type of contract that was previously signed and was “plagued with unconstitutionalities.”】

item.title: 德玛莱的 Power Sustainable 放弃中国股票策略
item.description: 由蒙特利尔亿万富翁德斯马莱斯家族控制的专注于气候问题的公司 Power Sustainable 将关闭其在中国的投资管理业务，并结束其在中国的公共股票战略。【原文：Power Sustainable, a climate-focused firm that’s controlled by Montreal’s billionaire Desmarais family, is shutting its investment management operations in China and winding down its public equities strategy in the country.】

item.title: FCA 称公司内幕警报三年未开启
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）在其最新的市场通讯中向企业发出了新的警告— 请务必打开新闻。【原文：The Financial Conduct Authority had a new warning for firms in its latest market newsletter — make sure to turn on the news.】

item.title: 据称土耳其计划采取新财政措施应对 70% 的通胀率
item.description: 据知情人士透露，土耳其官员准备最早于周一宣布一系列削减公共开支的财政措施，以支持抗击猖獗的通货膨胀。【原文：Turkish officials are readying to announce a series of fiscal measures as early as Monday to cut public spending in a bid to support the fight against rampant inflation, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 空头获利 31%，Grifols 绊倒埃利奥特分拆计划
item.description: General Industrial Partners 对西班牙公司 Grifols SA 的空头押注广为人知，帮助该对冲基金获得了两位数的收益，而对同一只股票的看涨押注则导致 Elliott Management 前交易员 Franck Tuil 蒙受损失。【原文：A well-publicized short bet by General Industrial Partners on Spanish company Grifols SA helped the hedge fund earn double-digit gains while bullish wagers on the same stock caused losses to former Elliott Management trader Franck Tuil.】

item.title: 思杰母公司希望通过重新定价节省 41 亿美元贷款
item.description: 思杰系统公司（Citrix Systems Inc. 的母公司云软件集团公司（Cloud Software Group Inc.【原文：Citrix Systems Inc. parent Cloud Software Group Inc. is poised to save millions of dollars in annual interest costs from its planned $4.1 billion repricing of a leveraged loan.】

item.title: 加拿大央行称家庭可承受更高利率
item.description: 加拿大央行表示，家庭可以承受较高的借贷成本，但指出资产估值和租房者偿债能力的上升是金融前景面临的风险。【原文：The Bank of Canada says households can weather higher borrowing costs, but flagged rising asset valuations and debt serviceability among renters as risks to the financial outlook.】

item.title: 波兰保持利率稳定，担心通胀可能反弹
item.description: 波兰中央银行连续第七个月维持利率不变，因为尽管波兰经济复苏迄今为止仍然乏力，但人们仍然担心今年晚些时候会爆发通货膨胀。【原文：Poland’s central bank kept interest rates unchanged for a seventh straight month as concerns persist that inflation will flare up later this year despite a so-far sluggish economic recovery.】

item.title: 普华永道在加拿大裁员约 60 人，为经济放缓做准备
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，全球会计师事务所普华永道在加拿大裁员 60 人，以应对该国经济放缓带来的影响。【原文：PricewaterhouseCoopers, the global accounting firm, eliminated 60 jobs in Canada as the company braces for the fallout from the nation’s economic slowdown, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 瑞银进一步推迟提交对 AT1 剔除案的回应
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的代表律师成功地争取到了进一步推迟提交与去年瑞信 170 亿美元附加一级债券化为乌有时投资者提起的诉讼有关的意见的时间。【原文：Lawyers representing UBS Group AG have managed to win a further delay in submitting comments related to a case brought by investors burned when $17 billion of Credit Suisse Additional Tier 1 bonds were wiped out last year.】

item.title: 加纳塞地兑美元汇率历史性下跌
item.description: 加纳的塞地正处于创纪录的疲软周期。【原文：Ghana’s cedi is in a record-breaking weakening cycle.】
